mapper.insert: insert into tb_purchaseitem(no, name, price, produce_date, purpose, standard, section_code, factory_code, insert_userid, insert_day) values(#{no }, #{name }, #{price }, #{producedate }, #{purpose }, #{standard }, #{sectioncode }, #{factorycode }, #{insertuserid }, now())

insert into tb_factory(no, name, purchaseitem_code, postaddress, roadaddress, detailaddress, manager_name, insert_userid, insert_day) values(#{no }, #{name }, #{purchaseitemcode }, #{postaddress }, #{roadaddress }, #{detailaddress }, #{managername }, #{insertuserid }, now())
mapper.update: update tb_purchaseitem set name = #{name }, price = #{price }, produce_date = #{producedate }, purpose = #{purpose }, standard = #{standard }, section_code = #{sectioncode }, factory_code = #{factorycode }, update_userid = #{updateuserid }, update_day = now() where no = #{no }
mapper.select: select factory_code from tb_purchaseitem where no = #{no } and delete_flag = "N"
mapper.update: update tb_factory set no = #{no }, name = #{name }, postaddress = #{postaddress }, roadaddress = #{roadaddress }, detailaddress = #{detailaddress }, manager_name = #{managername }, update_userid = #{updateuserid }, update_day = now() where purchaseitem_code = #{purchaseitemcode } and no = #{originNo }
update tb_purchaseitem set delete_flag = "Y", update_userid = #{updateuserid }, update_day = now() where no = #{no }
update tb_factory set delete_flag = "Y", update_userid = #{updateuserid }, update_day = now() where no = #{no } and purchaseitem_code = #{purchaseitemcode }
mapper.select: select no, name, price, date(produce_date) as producedate, purpose, standard, section_code as sectioncode, factory_code as factorycode from tb_purchaseitem where no = #{no } and delete_flag = "N"
select no, name, postaddress, roadaddress, detailaddress, manager_name as managername from tb_factory where no = #{factorycode } and purchaseitem_code = #{purchaseitemcode } and delete_flag = "N"
select no, classification, code, last_update as lastUpdate, parent_no as parentNo from tb_section where parent_no = 1 and code = #{no }

select p.no, p.name, p.price, date(p.produce_date) as producedate, p.section_code as sectioncode, p.standard, s.classification as sectionname, f.manager_name as managername from tb_purchaseitem p, tb_factory f, tb_section s where p.no = f.purchaseitem_code and p.section_code = s.code and s.parent_no = 1 and p.delete_flag = "N" order by p.idx asc limit #{page_group }, 55
select no, classification, code, last_update as lastUpdate, parent_no as parentNo from tb_section where parent_no = 1 and classification like #{sectionname }

select p.no, p.name, p.price, date(p.produce_date) as producedate, p.section_code as sectioncode, p.standard, s.classification as sectionname, f.manager_name as managername from tb_purchaseitem p, tb_factory f, tb_section s where p.no = f.purchaseitem_code and p.section_code = s.code and s.parent_no = 1 and p.delete_flag = "N" order by p.idx asc limit #{page }, 11
